channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Wall Street Is Cautiously Optimistic for the Rest of 2025
item.description: Big Tech stocks are rising, international equities keep rallying, and the Fed is set to cut rates.

item.title: After 50 Long Years, McDonald’s Just Made a Big Announcement. It All Starts Tomorrow Morning
item.description: It’s a good example of updating a successful product to meet changing tastes.

item.title: Even Happy Couples Still Want to Kill Each Other Sometimes, a New Study Says
item.description: A new study could reassure entrepreneurs worried that fights and low moments with partners mean more serious relationship troubles.

item.title: My New Boss Hates Me for No Apparent Reason. What Should I Do?
item.description: “Almost every week he reminds me that if I don’t do something he asks, I can get fired.” Minda Zetlin weighs in on a sticky work situation.

item.title: Corporate America Soured on ‘Business for Good.’ Here’s How to Reframe Conscious Capitalism
